issue.explanation: Ensures that resource id's passed to APIs are of the right type; for example, calling `Resources.getColor(R.string.name)` is wrong.

issue.message: The WIFI_SERVICE must be looked up on the Application context or memory will leak on devices < Android N. Try changing `` to `.getApplicationContext()`
issue.explanation: On versions prior to Android N (24), initializing the `WifiManager` via `Context#getSystemService` can cause a memory leak if the context is not the application context. Change `context.getSystemService(...)` to `context.getApplicationContext().getSystemService(...)`.

issue.message: The WIFI_SERVICE must be looked up on the Application context or memory will leak on devices < Android N. Try changing `` to `.getApplicationContext()`
issue.explanation: On versions prior to Android N (24), initializing the `WifiManager` via `Context#getSystemService` can cause a memory leak if the context is not the application context. Change `context.getSystemService(...)` to `context.getApplicationContext().getSystemService(...)`.
